messages.content: What is a necessary requirement to use the DaVinci node in ComfyUI?
To use the DaVinci node in ComfyUI, DaVinci Resolve Studio must be connected to the API.
Where can I find the API documentation for the DaVinci Resolve Studio?

The API documentation for DaVinci Resolve Studio can be found in the help section under HELP>DOCUMENTATION>DEVELOPER. When you open the folder and search for scripting, you will find the README.txt file containing the API documentation.
How do I access the API documentation for DaVinci Resolve Studio?

To access the API documentation for DaVinci Resolve Studio, you must go to the help section in DaVinci Resolve Studio and select HELP>DOCUMENTATION>DEVELOPER. Here, you will find a folder that contains scripting, and searching within this folder for README.txt will lead you to the API documentation.
What steps must I take to connect DaVinci Resolve Studio to the API?

To connect DaVinci Resolve Studio to the API, you need to ensure that the DaVinci Resolve Studio is installed on your system and that the API endpoint is properly configured within the settings of the DaVinci Resolve Studio.
What is the purpose of using the CGUI-Noderesample in ComfyUI?
The CGUI-Noderesample node in ComfyUI is used to resample audio tracks and returns their parameters.
